age. Additionally, when excision is performed 
during pregnancy there is a high rate of incomplete excision and recurrence. Unless invasive cancer is suspected, any 
intervention should be delayed until after 12 weeks postpartum when she should be reevaluated and appropriate treatment 
provided then.
